p: The CCK8 kit was purchased from MedChemExpress in the United States, the transwell cell was purchased from Corning in the United States, and the Annexin V-FITC/PI apoptosis kit was purchased from Sigma-Aldrich in the United States. Phospho-Akt (Ser473) antibody, Phospho-Akt (Thr308) antibody, Akt (pan) antibody, mTOR antibody, and Phospho-mTOR (Ser2448) antibody were purchased from Cell Signaling Technology, USA.
